description:
Bunnyling is the app with the playful bunny that everybody loves! The bunny loves being played with and when you poke him, he will laugh and have a good time. AND if you tap and hold, you can now feed the bunnyling a carrot! But if you leave him alone, he gets very upset and silently cries.

This app is great for kids! They will love it!

New in version 2.1.4 -
 - Fixes bug where the bunny laughs when you launch the app before you tap it.
 - Added about page

New in version 2.1.3 -
 - You can feed the bunnyling a carrot when you tap and hold the screen!
 - The images are new and refreshed.
 - The icon is new and refreshed.

Please leave a review and visit our website to help us improve this app and future ones!!!!
versionNote:
- Fixes bug where the bunny laughs when you launch the app before you tap it.
 - Added about page
